Articles.Content:
Tuesday EggHunting (Looking for All the Easter Egg's, currently in the Joolian System)

Thursday KASA RPL (Realistic Career)

Streams Start at 11am PST

http://www.twitch.tv/grim187plays

Direction

I'm not sure what i want to do or how often i want to do it.

I think i will start off doing a one hour live stream 2 times a week.

it's been a few weeks, taking suggestions wasn't very popular and i have been wanting to start a space program

so for the foreseeable future thursdays will be GSC.

im done with the Pentathlon and im not sure what to do next, i think i will eventually pick challenges from the forum but for now i'm going to do KGSS.

I completed the first mission in KGSS 5+ times and it didn't register so i got 0.18 and tried to complete it but decided to skip it and go for a better idea; easter egg hunt, so that's what i will be doing on tuesday for the foreseeable future. [8/20/13]

Update:

after a lot of grief with trying to find the exact location of the easter eggs i finally figured out they might be below the ground and have started to make some serious progress toward finding all of them on kerbin. [9/24/13]

my space program is progressing slower than i had anticipated, i had a setback last week when my ground refueler attempted docking with my station and the ports ripped off, so this week i installed the kethane mod and spent 3 hours at 2fps putting 3 x 4 kethane probes into orbit around the mun to find out i have to be watching them if i want them to detect.

[9/26/13]

i have spent 10 weeks trying to find the first egg on duna to no avail...i ended up redesigning the mission 3 weeks ago when i crash landed and left bill stranded on the dunan suffice.

the good news is i should have kethane mining and refining setup on ike sometime soon.

i still have not made much progress in my space program, it seems i lack a good plan to progress.

so i will be switching to KASA RPL (real progression light) career sometime within the next few weeks.

[3/26/2014]

things are going much smoother with finding eggs on duna, the SCANSAT mod has been a big help.

im almost ready to start development of craft for the Joolian system, after that i'm not sure there will be any left.

i was thinking about doing a marathon livestream with cheats and trying to visit all the eggs (from memory) as a way to end the series...it has been running about a year.

KASA RPL is coming along nicely, i've hit a few bumpy patches, a bit of overstepping tech capability, getting to much science, spending it unwisely and having to scrape the barrel.

i have been editing down the kasa live streams and doing a bit of post production (i'm not sure now what to do with the talking bit but i think i'm starting to get it figured out)

and uploading them to my youtube channel.

p.s. maybe i should have waited till the 26th to update.

[6/23/2014]

Edited July 28, 2014 by Grim187
Quarterly(?) Update
Pentathlon Docking Challenge live in about 50 minutes.
Live with first installment of GSC in about an hour.
just uploaded the Announce trailer for my upcoming Youtube Series.
Going Live in 10 Minutes with KSP 0.18 KGSS Scenarios
going live with egg hunting in about 45mins.
about to go live with my space program, putting more fuel into orbit and a kethane miner on the mun.
i should probably bump this, since i haven't done that yet this year...
